p: Thyroid hormone biosynthesis requires active hydrogen peroxide production which may also be responsible for the high level of oxidative DNA damage. The NADPH oxidase/dual oxidase family members are the only known oxidoreductases whose primary function is production of reactive oxygen species, and their increased expression levels were previously shown in thyroid cancer [ 36]. We compared expressions of NOX1, NOX3, NOX4, NOX5, DUOX1, and DUOX2 genes in our experimental FA, FC, and PC samples and found no significant differences between the above thyroid tumor types (data not shown).
